# VideoGenNews

> Source-linked reporting on AI video models, workflows, and policy.

VideoGenNews is a specialist news publication covering AI video tools, model behavior, creator workflows, and platform policy. Every story includes named bylines, visible publish/update timestamps, and linked sources with tier labels.

## Key Sections

- [All Stories](https://videogennews.com/news/): Full archive of published coverage.
- [Model Wire](https://videogennews.com/desks/model-wire/): Model launches, capability updates, and release-note verification.
- [Workflow Lab](https://videogennews.com/desks/workflow-lab/): Creator pipelines, post-production systems, and throughput analysis.
- [Benchmark Lab](https://videogennews.com/desks/benchmark-lab/): Benchmark design, reproducibility checks, and evaluation caveats.
- [Policy/IP Watch](https://videogennews.com/desks/policy-ip-watch/): Rights risk, provenance, and regulatory developments.
- [Distribution Intelligence](https://videogennews.com/desks/distribution-intelligence/): Recommendation systems, audience retention, and platform shifts.
- [Toolchain Desk](https://videogennews.com/desks/toolchain-desk/): API integrations, editing stacks, and deployment reliability.

## Editorial Standards

- [Methodology](https://videogennews.com/methodology/): Source selection, evidence scoring, and update rules.
- [Editorial Policy](https://videogennews.com/editorial-policy/): Newsroom standards and content-type labeling.
- [Corrections](https://videogennews.com/corrections/): Public correction log with timestamps.
- [About](https://videogennews.com/about/): Mission, ownership, and funding transparency.
- [Masthead](https://videogennews.com/masthead/): Staff listing and desk assignments.

## Authors

- [Nora Ellis](https://videogennews.com/authors/nora-ellis/): Executive Editor, Model Wire.
- [Liam Ortega](https://videogennews.com/authors/liam-ortega/): Senior Reporter, Workflow Lab.
- [Maya Chen](https://videogennews.com/authors/maya-chen/): Managing Editor, Verification & Policy.
- [Devin Brooks](https://videogennews.com/authors/devin-brooks/): Reporter, Benchmark Lab.
- [Sofia Rao](https://videogennews.com/authors/sofia-rao/): Reporter, Research-to-Product.
- [Ethan Morales](https://videogennews.com/authors/ethan-morales/): Reporter, Toolchain Desk.
- [Iris Kim](https://videogennews.com/authors/iris-kim/): Reporter, Distribution Intelligence.
- [Zoe Hart](https://videogennews.com/authors/zoe-hart/): Reporter, Trend Radar.
